intro: Helipterum anactinum, commonly known as the slender helipterum, is a flowering plant native to Australia. It belongs to the family Goodeniaceae and is characterized by its delicate, tubular flowers that range in color from pink to purple. The plant typically grows in sandy or rocky soils and is often found in coastal or inland regions. It has small, narrow leaves and produces seed pods that split open to release its seeds. Helipterum anactinum is a low-growing perennial that thrives in well-drained environments.
